programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: As the team closes in on drug kingpin Javier Escano, Voight is forced to lie to his undercover informant Anna to keep her on track; their deteriorating trust threatens an increasingly tenuous operation.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: After an explosion rocks the case, the team scrambles to finally take down Escano as everyone nears their breaking point.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Still reeling from the death of informant Anna, Voight faces a new threat as he tries to keep the neighborhood clean; new wrinkles develop in the Upton, Halstead and Voight dynamic; the team gets a new chief.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: When a convicted murderer hijacks a prison van, the team scrambles to find him and the abducted prison guard before it's too late; Burgess questions Ruzek's motives in a case, creating tension between the two.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: The team investigates a string of brutal pharmacy robberies, and Halstead connects with one of the victims about their Army careers; Upton suspects there is more to the story and confides in Voight.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: A murder pulls rookie officer Dante Torres into his own neighborhood; as Voight and Atwater help him navigate the case and manage tricky personal dynamics with wary neighbors, Torres realizes his life may be forever changed.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Upton's dogged pursuit of a missing teenage girl leads the team into a dark web of human trafficking; chief O'Neal becomes involved with the unit's investigation when it becomes evident his son, Sean, has a connection to the missing girl.

programme.title: Tropical Heat
programme.desc: An artist in love with a client's mistress rampages when he can't win her over.

programme.title: Tropical Heat
programme.desc: Nick and Sylvie work on opposite sides of a divorce case.

programme.title: Tropical Heat
programme.desc: A woman being blackmailed with a videotape is murdered.

programme.title: Tropical Heat
programme.desc: Murder results when a developer is caught between his young new wife and his jealous daughter.

programme.title: Xploration Animal Science
programme.desc: The lifecycle of the butterfly; how birds fly; how a Venus flytrap catches its prey.

programme.title: Xploration Animal Science
programme.desc: The jaguar's spots; how a bee sting works; salmon migrate thousands of miles to spawn.

programme.desc: In New Zealand, Cousteau explores Auckland's volcanic field and sees one of the largest insects on the planet.

programme.desc: The winner of the first Student Explorer contest; swimming with whale sharks.

programme.title: Magnum P.I.
programme.desc: When an Army Ranger goes missing after returning from deployment, Magnum learns of the traumatic news he received upon arriving home and must find him before survivor's guilt consumes him.

programme.title: Magnum P.I.
programme.desc: When a married woman asks Magnum and Higgins to find her lover's killer because she doesn't want to expose the affair to the police, they find the victim wasn't who he claimed to be; Rick visits Icepick, whose health has taken a turn for the worse.

programme.title: Magnum P.I.
programme.desc: When a Marine Corps vet's SUV is stolen with her service dog inside, Magnum and Higgins must find the car, the dog and the car thief who they believe may be an escaped kidnapping victim.

programme.title: Magnum P.I.
programme.desc: As Magnum and Higgins work a case to recover valuable stolen truffles, they also must care for a baby left abandoned at the gates of their estate; Kumu tries to locate the infant's mother.

programme.title: Magnum P.I.
programme.desc: A psychic hires Magnum and Higgins to prevent a murder she claims to have foreseen; Katsumoto questions Kumu when her information is found on recovered stolen jewels that once belonged to the infamous Imelda Marcos.

programme.title: Magnum P.I.
programme.desc: Magnum's uncle visits and reveals a shocking secret about Thomas' mother; TC asks Higgins for help when he realizes he may have witnessed a potential murder from his helicopter; Higgins decides it's time to tell Ethan the truth about her past.

programme.title: Magnum P.I.
programme.desc: Magnum and Higgins work a stalking case involving a man with a past in espionage; Ethan asks Higgins to join him on an extended trip for Doctors Without Borders just as Magnum starts to open up to other possibilities.

programme.title: Magnum P.I.
programme.desc: Magnum is tasked with finding a single mom being hunted by two very dangerous gangs; while Higgins is abroad with Ethan, a misstep forces her to assist an old employer.

programme.title: Magnum P.I.
programme.desc: While Magnum and Higgins reunite and work the case of a construction worker's tragic death, TC and Shammy get skyjacked by a pair of drug runners posing as tourists.

programme.title: WNBA
programme.sub-title: Phoenix Mercury at New York Liberty
programme.desc: The East-leading Liberty aim to solve their woes against the Mercury. Phoenix is 2-0 against New York this season. The Liberty strengthened their bench by adding 2019 WNBA Finals MVP Emma Meesseman and ex-Valkyrie Stephanie Talbot to the fold.
